About.paragraph: We are a team of passionate eCommerce experts, software engineers, web designers, Quality Analysts, and other IT professionals. At Live Commerce, we make sure that irrespective of the kind or size of your business, you get the best-in-class solutions.  Over the years, we have helped SMEs and companies launch eCommerce seamlessly while addressing unique requirements.

Services.name: eCommerce Website Development
Services.text: Fully customized, UX-driven, and tech-rich online websites that entice customers and boost your online business revenue.

Services.name: Custom eCommerce Website Design
Services.text: Unique and captivating web design that helps your brand establish an impactful and profitable presence in the eCommerce space.

Services.name: Online Marketplace Development
Services.text: Feature-rich, seamless, and secure online marketplace enabling sellers of all kinds to list and sell their products

Services.name: Headless eCommerce Solutions
Services.text: Dynamic, user-focused, and evolved eCommerce solutions to keep you at the frontier of the rapidly changing digital commerce wave.

Services.name: B2B eCommerce Solutions
Services.text: Online commerce solutions that fulfill all your business-to-business selling requirements while ensuring flawless security.

Services.name: eCommerce Platform Upgrade
Services.text: Services and solutions to upgrade or migrate your existing online store built on Magento, Shopify, WooCommerce, Drupal, etc.

Services.name: eCommerce Mobile Apps
Services.text: Personalized to meet a business’s unique needs, our apps help you tap the potential of expansive smartphone owners’ space.

Services.name: Payment Gateway Integration
Services.text: A full range of payment solutions to make our site’s check-out process intuitive and secure for every single transaction.

Services.name: Maintenance & Tech Support
Services.text: Our tech support promptly resolves all your queries and efficiently addresses all the maintenance requirements.

Features.title: Magento
Features.text: Magento has best-in-class features for both B2B and B2C merchants. Besides, Magento B2C offers additional capabilities for business-to-business sellers. With a fully personalized experience and hassle-free purchasing, Magento drives your online sales in many ways

Features.title: Shopify
Features.text: Shopify powers your online operations by automating processes and enabling customer-friendly features. You can seamlessly manage both B2B and B2C commerce from one platform. Be it sales, operations, or customer support, Shopify automates everything.

Features.title: WooCommerce
Features.text: WooCommerce is an eCommerce plugin for WordPress websites. It integrates top eCommerce extensions and best-in-class online commerce capabilities. WooCommerce continuously adds new features and extensions that enhance both B2B and B2C eCommerce performance.

Features.title: BigCommerce
Features.text: BigCommerce is a design- and feature-rich platform for B2B and B2C buyers. The eCommerce framework lets you create a site with large catalogs. BigCommerce utilizes automated capabilities for an array of functionalities like pricing, customer segmentation, order management, etc.

Features.title: CS-Cart
Features.text: CS-Cart is one of the most trusted multi-vendor eCommerce platforms. It offers hundreds of features, including fully customizable source code, drag-and-drop templates, and many more. With CS-Cart, you don’t have to spend money on purchasing add-ons and developing missing features.

Features.title: Drupal Commerce
Features.text: Drupal is more widely known as a CMS platform. Its eCommerce version, Drupal Commerce, is used to build eCommerce websites and applications alike. It offers immense development flexibility to create a design-rich eCommerce website for your business.

Features.title: PrestaShop
Features.text: PrestaShop lets you build your eCommerce store for free. A suitable online store development platform for small to mid-sized merchants. PrestaShop’s design focuses on B2C eCommerce. PrestaShop is available worldwide and has dozens of payment modules.

Features.title: OpenCart
Features.text: OpenCart is one of the best open-source eCommerce development platforms. It enables you to start your online business quickly. OpenCart provides a flexible framework for creating unique designs and features. And you can choose from a range of themes and extensions.

FAQs.question: How much does it cost to develop an eCommerce website?
FAQs.answer: The costs of building an eCommerce website vary widely, depending on your needs. If you need a simple online store with basic features and a storefront, costs are comparatively lower. We offer reliable eCommerce development at a competitive price.

FAQs.question: How much does it cost to develop a B2B eCommerce website?
FAQs.answer: The costs of building a B2B eCommerce website vary widely, depending on your needs. If you need a simple online store with basic features and a storefront, costs are comparatively lower. Live Commerce India offers reliable B2B solutions at a competitive price

FAQs.question: What is an omnichannel eCommerce strategy?
FAQs.answer: An omnichannel eCommerce strategy is an approach to sales and marketing that provides customers with a fully integrated shopping experience. It is achieved by combining user experiences from brick-and-mortar to mobile browsing, to social media everything in between
